text: Liliana Piera Marina Brescia Clerici, best known professionally as Liliana Ross, (March 30, 1939 â€“ June 10, 2018) was an Italian-born Chilean actress, director, playwright, and theatrical producer. She was born in Genoa, Italy. Her career lasted for fifty years. She was best known for her starring roles in the Chilean telenovelas La Colorina (1977) and Machos (2003). Ross died at her home in Santiago, Chile, on June 10, 2018 from complications of Alzheimer's disease, at the age of 79. ==References== Category:1939 births Category:2018 deaths Category:Deaths from Alzheimer's disease Category:Italian movie actors Category:Italian television actors Category:Italian stage actors Category:Writers from Genoa Category:Chilean movie actors Category:Chilean television actors Category:Chilean stage actors Category:Chilean playwrights Category:Actors from Genoa
title: Liliana Ross
